author: David Gauthier-Villars
title: This Definitely Isn’t the Russian Olympic House - WSJ
text:
GANGNEUNG, South Korea—A shining samovar, Soviet-era songs alternating with disco hits and hypnotic red paint on the walls: Welcome to Sports House, an attempt to host Olympic-size parties without infuriating the Winter Games’ governing authorities.
While it has banned Russia over a doping scandal, the International Olympic Committee has allowed its athletes to come to Pyeongchang as long as they agreed to hide their citizenship.
